name: Game Gen - Snake
description:
Controls:
WASD, Arrow Keys, and D-pad all move the Snake.
(The D-Pad on the screen can be touched on mobile and clicked with a mouse)

In this form of snake, the gameplay is the same for turning, moving, and getting longer each fruit you eat, however the changes come in the environment itself.
The game starts with 3 fruit on screen, and after certain point milestones up to 6 will be on screen at once, as well as you moving faster.

The game goes on as long as you can manage to not hit your own body, and the goal is to get as many points and by extension as long of a snake as possible.
